text: Jerry S. Wolinsky is an American scientist, currently the Bartels Family and Opal C. Rankin Professor of Neurology at University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston (UTHealth) and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston faculty Category:University of Illinois alumni Category:American scientists
title: Jerry Wolinsky
